Merge pull request #64 from Flipboard/share

Share sheet fix and improvement

Add custom column width to ImagePicker and Menu sheets

The default is sensible, but some apps might want a different number of columns than other

Fix mix-ins pointing to the wrong application package

The first parameter of ComponentInfo is the app id, which is different from the java package
There is no way to get the app id without a context.
The sample project only worked because the application id was exactly the same as the java package by coincidence

NOTE: the is a breaking API change for using mix-ins with IntentPickerSheetView in commons
Fixes https://github.com/Flipboard/bottomsheet/issues/62

Make column width for Intent picker sheet configurable

The default is sensible, but different apps might want different numbers of columns
Increase version to 1.4.2 for bintray release

Handle showing a sheet when another sheet is already showing

Cancel any running bottomsheet animation when the view is detached

Avoids doing extra work after the view is no longer on screen

Handle showing a sheet when another sheet is already showing

In most cases, the caller will want to replace the current sheet with the new one
Animate out the existing sheet normally, and then animate in the new sheet

Merge pull request #58 from Flipboard/dim

Make bottomsheet work with YoutubePlayer from the Youtube SDK

Make bottomsheet work with YoutubePlayer from the Youtube SDK

The player pauses if something is covering it. In the bottomsheet case, the dimview was always covering it
The alpha was always 0 in the closed state, but the player doesn't care about that
Setting dimView to INVISIBLE makes the player work. It will still pause when a sheet is opened, but that seems like expected behavior, and it can be resume after closing the sheet
Update README with ImagePicker gif

Merge pull request #54 from Flipboard/z/misc_updates

Couple misc updates

Set drawSelectorOnTop in constructor

Copy pasta mistake, doesn't need to happen in onMeasure

Default to WRAP_CONTENT for height

This way content that doesn't fill the screen won't allow for a fully expanded state

Standardize columnCount calculation method

Doing it in onMeasure avoids platform and race conditions with onLayout, while allowing for dynamic calculation if the sheet is set to match parent width

Merge pull request #53 from Flipboard/mixin_updates

Mix-in updates

Lazy load icons in intent picker sheet in bottomsheet commons

Loading icons can take a long time, especially the first time the sheet is opened
This change makes the sheet open significantly faster that first time, at the expense of the icons coming in a little later

Handle column number in onMeasure instead of onLayout

onLayout is too late. That's why Android complains in newer versions, and just fails in older versions

Modify click handling API for IntentPickerSheet in commons

Some usages of mix-ins need a way to keep track of some extra information
Note: this introduces a breaking API change for the intent share sheet in bottomsheet-commons

Fix stale class reference

We should really get some basic smoke testing going on travis...

Merge pull request #50 from Flipboard/z/image_picker

Image picker sheet

Update to bintray-release 3.4 and android gradle plugin 1.3.1

Was waiting for a fix to be merged to the 3.4 version of the bintray-release plugin before we could update to android's 1.3.1 update

Add special tile type intdef to make the special constructor obvious

One should only be using this constructor for CAMERA and PICKER, so this makes that obvious
Restructure ImagePickerTile and standardize storage v. picker nomenclature

Use different name and more accurate docs for ImagePickerSheetImageView

Name change avoids the explicit implication that it's always a square, which isn't actually the case when widthSpec's mode isn't EXACTLY
Use more accurate name for clarity in measuring
Keep track of original list top padding so it doesn't compound on repeat setTitle() calls
Update travis config
Add missing docs to BottomSheetLayout

Add ImagePickerSheetView sample to sample app

This includes some general example implementations for how to handle camera capture and image picking as well, complete with permission checking.

Implement ImagePickerSheetView

This is a sheet view that shows a grid of recent local images as well as options to take a new picture or pick one from any app that supports the image picking API. This adds a dependency on the actual bottom sheet library (to access its isTablet/predictedDefaultWidth functions), which we should probably have been doing anyway.

Add public helper methods for retrieving BottomSheetLayout configs

These will be useful for some of the commons components as well as anyone that wants to have logic ahead of time for how BottomSheetLayout will behave on different densities.
API 23

Still not compatible with android gradle plugin 1.3.0+, but it's the latest at least

Add preparing state to sheet view.

Merge pull request #35 from davideas/master

Added custom peek

Default sheetEndX to screen width

This ensures that the sheet behaves normally when it's match parent, and fixes a bug where full-width sheets would always register touches as outside the sheet
Fix incorrect dimen resource name

Use pre-defined widths for tablets when sheet params are WRAP_CONTENT

This introduces some proper width handling on tablets. Forcing all sheets to be the same width as the parent can be a bad UI experience, especially for short lines of text.

This is based on what the system does for the width of the notification panel, with custom sizes for sw600dp and sw720dp screen densities.

Merge pull request #16 from Flipboard/z_update_readme

Update README

Show proper elevation commons sheets

Unfortunately I can't think of/figure out a way to let BottomSheetLayout handle this itself, but it at least gives us a good example to show. This adds the 16dp elevation on Lollipop+ to sheets (per the material spec) in the commons sheets

Update ActivityInfo refs in the README

Because now it's spelled correctly

Update README

This simplifies the README a bit while also adding info about MenuSheetView
Adds getter for dismiss mode

Exposes control for dismissal when in expanded state
Instead of assuming that a back press should change the state from EXPANDED to PEEKED, this can now be controlled through BottomSheetLayout.setDismissMode(State). The default is HIDDEN, which completely dismisses the Bottom Sheet when back is pressed in EXPANDED state.

Updates MenuActivity sample to demonstrate BottomSheetLayout.setDismissMode(State).

Restructure sample app to allow easier additions of future samples

Add MenuSheetView implementation

MenuSheetView is a sheet implementation that is backed by a Menu under the hood. This makes it easy to simply show a sheet with a menu resource, similar to the NavigationView in the design support library.

This centers it in the remaining space even if a word is cutoff, and ellipsizes the end where appropriate

Make intent picker grid sheet and grid more to spec with material

* 757575 text colors
* To-spec text sizes
* To-spec spacing (ish. Gridview limits how close we can get an item to the edge based on the total width and number of columns we're using)
